# PPStudio

## Example

```html
<amp-embed
  type="ppstudio"
  width="300"
  height="250"
  data-crid="16013"
  data-holder-script="https://tenmaxsgads.blob.core.windows.net/holder/16013_f9742d8d6d22.js"
>
</amp-embed>
```

### Configuration

For configuration semantics, contact [TenMax](https://www.tenmax.io/en/).

### Required parameters

-   `data-crid`
-   `data-width`
-   `data-height`
-   `data-holderScript`

### Optional parameters
